name: Journey Of The Seasons(Check Description)
description:
Description :

The game is a open world Zelda-like where you explore a simple but fun map in  search of the power of the seasons with which you will have the power to change seasons to change the map and its items

Story:

A meteorite is falling and you need to find the power of the seasons before it crashes on earth in 120 months!

Controls: 

WASD to move

F to attack

Q and E to switch seasons

Credits:

Me! : game design and programming 

Lexany14 and Sandoskan: Art

Chachanii: Music and sounds
